alert.note: Alert for Logan; Simpson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 24 at 11:57PM EDT until March 25 at 12:15AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL LOGAN AND WESTERN SIMPSON COUNTIES... At 1056 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles east of Dunmor to 9 miles northwest of Cross Plains to near Greenbrier, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Russellville, Auburn, Adairville, Black Jack, Neosheo, Dennis, Geddes, Chandlers Chapel, South Union and Gasper. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
